name: Lightning Bingo - Elven Woods
description:
Lightning Bingo is an exciting new version of classic bingo games. Mark your card and complete rows or all four corners to earn points. Race against the clock to get the highest score possible. Collect special powerups like the time extender and score multiplier. Trigger a powerful autoplay feature to mark your card in super fast time!

Delve into the mysterious Elven Woods and prepare yourself to meet the elusive wood fairy and elf who live in the woodlands. These mythical beings look serene and beautiful but they are also playful. Get to know the wood elves and wood fairies better in this game as you relax and unwind from your work and study.
In the olden days, before humans explored and conquered the woods, many mythical beings lived in this area. Now it is very hard to see any elf or wood fairy in the woodland. Why not take time to appreciate these mythical beings with this Elven Wood theme game?

One by one you can unlock images of a wood fairy and wood elves. The entire collection of images in our Elven Wood theme feels magical and otherworldly. It will take you back to the olden days where these mythical beings still roamed the woodland and spread their magical touch to mother earth.



The artwork of Elven Woods
Delve into the mysterious Elven Woods and prepare yourself to meet the elusive wood fairies and elves who live in the woodlands! Unlock beautiful elven images as you complete levels in the game.

=====================
LIGHTNING BINGO FEATURES:
=====================
• Fun and exciting Bingo game for all ages.
• Use Powerups to help you achieve highscores.
• Reveal magnificent images after you've completed a level.
• Enjoy beautiful background music while you play.
• Chill out and play speed bingo whenever and wherever you are.

With tons of levels and exciting Bingo gameplay, what are you waiting for?!
